    Function reference

    All functions

    calculate_advice_devlang()
    Referral advice for language development
    calculate_advice_hdc()
    Referral advice for head circumference
    calculate_advice_hgt()
    Referral advice for body height
    calculate_advice_wgt()
    Referral advice for weight for height
    calculate_birth_z()
    Calculate birth weight SDS relative to Dutch references
    calculate_screening_doms()
    Extract measurements that can function as date zero
    calculate_th()
    Calculate target height SDS
    ref.nl5defSGAgewicht ref.nl5defSGAlengte nl5.hgt messages bmi_table target
    Table of Dutch birth weight references
    date2age()
    Calculate decimal age from date of birth and date of measurement
    fold()
    Fold long string across multiple lines
    list_screeners()
    List the available screeners for JGZ guidelines
    msg()
    Find message string
    pick_reference_wgt()
    Pick reference for evaluating weight guidelines
    screen_curves_ind()
    Screen growth curves according to JGZ guidelines
    screen_curves_tgt()
    Screen growth curves according to JGZ guidelines
